title.rendered: Donating or recycling old hearing aids

content.rendered:
Rather than throwing out your child’s old hearing aids or storing them in a drawer, they can be recycled or donated. Not only are you helping the planet, but you can help those who are on low incomes or in developing nations. Click on the links to find out how.

Hearing Australia can also use more current donated aids as loan aids.

Download the Real Life Tips infographic.

More information:

  • Hearing Aid Banks | Hearing Services
  • What to do with old hearing aids | Bay Audio
